sentences.en: a replica of the Eiffel tower
A replica technique is used to record the scratch patterns before and after loading.
sentences.cn: 可采用一种复制技术把在加载前后的划痕图案记录下来.

sentences.en: An exact replica of the fatal wound.
sentences.cn: 和死者的致命伤完全一样的复制.

sentences.en: It was almost an exact replica of the Independence Act of 1933.
sentences.cn: 这个法案,几乎完全是1933年独立法的复制品.

sentences.en: It was replica of the bungalow she had left.
sentences.cn: 房子仍是她离开时的模样.

sentences.en: Replica weapons are indistinguishable from the real thing.
sentences.cn: 仿真武器与真武器很难区分。

sentences.en: Royce Hall was an exact replica of the basilica of Sant Ambrogio in Milan.
sentences.cn: 罗伊斯大厅是位于米兰的圣安布洛乔大教堂的原样复制建筑。

sentences.en: The colonies are replica - plated onto nitrocellulose filters.
sentences.cn: 将菌落影印接种在硝酸纤维素滤膜上.

sentences.en: The image is a perfect replica of the body.
sentences.cn: 映象成为人体形象的完美的拷贝.

sentences.en: The original conservatory has been rebuilt in replica.
The young artist made a replica of the famous painting.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻的画家临摹了这幅著名的作品.

sentences.en: They built an exact replica of the opera house in Naples.
sentences.cn: 他们建了一座与那不勒斯歌剧院一模一样的仿造品.

sentences.en: They should change the law to make it illegal to own replica weapons.
sentences.cn: 他们应该修订法律，使拥有仿制武器成为非法行为。

sentences.en: Tina as a child was a replica of her mother.
sentences.cn: 蒂娜小的时候和她妈妈简直一模一样。

sentences.en: You can't run the Database Splitter on a replica.
sentences.cn: 不能在副本上运行数据库拆分器.

words.tran_cn: 复制品；八音阶间隔的反覆音

trans.tran_en: an exact copy of something, especially a building, a gun, or a work of art
